titles.title: Monetary Policy Reform Act of 1993
To provide for a Federal Open Market Advisory Committee, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E168-171)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Growth and Credit Formation.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Monetary Policy Reform Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to establish the Federal Open Market Advisory Committee to advise the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System on the conduct of open-market operations.
